comment: : One of the most important political events of the past years is the draining of the swamp. It had gotten so one could barely distinguish between Republican or Democrat. But things are changing now. There is a new attitude growing everywhere!
amr:

                        :mod (p / politics)

                  :ARG1 (p3 / possible-01

                              :ARG0 (o / one)
                              :ARG1 (o2 / or
                                    :op1 (p4 / political-party
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Republican"))
                                    :op2 (p5 / political-party
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Democrat")))
                              :degree (b / barely)))))
      :snt3 (c2 / contrast-01

                  :time (n3 / now)))
      :snt4 (g2 / grow-02

            :location (e2 / everywhere)))
